system.powerDescription: Passive: When you gain any amount of stress, you can capture its negative energy without spending a psyche burst, appearing as a raised knot in your skin. Reduce stress suffered by 2 for each knot gained. You can capture up to 3 knots. At the end of any scene in which you have one or more knots, roll 1d6. When a knot bursts, you take 2 irreducible stress. • On a 1-3, take 1d3 sin and burst a knot. • On a 4-5, take 1 sin and burst a knot. • On a 6, take no sin and don't burst a knot.
